MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the WA4 postcode area of Warrington. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have managed to restore a number of properties in the area and are arranging for generators to be brought to site to restore the remaining customers without power. We now expect your supply to be restored by 6am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:15am on 17th January
